content: Create get_subreddit_watch_analytics() function to aggregate watch time by content_id
Create batch content details lookup function for subreddit mappings
Create export_subreddit_csv() function to generate CSV export
Add new route @rt('/watch-time/subreddits/export') to handle CSV export
Update CSV export to match old spreadsheet format with all required columns
Optimize queries to use user_watch_metrics materialized view
Add month-based filtering for easier processing
